column1: Smoque BBQ////I had lunch here on 11-30-2016.  This was my first visit.  I ordered the smoked turkey breast on white bread with Memphis BBQ sauce and potato salad.  The smoked turkey breast was very good.  Moist
column2: flavorful and plentiful.  The bread was very soft
column3: like room temperature.  I loved it.  The potato salad was crunch.  It was more like a pasta salad than a potato salad.  It contained scallions
column5: potatoes with the peel still on them
column6: but it didn't contain any eggs that I could tell.  I went based upon a coworker's recommendation.  It was good BBQ
column7: which is what I will stick to ordering on my next visit.
